By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the To-Do list tab extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy

Elevate Your New Tab Experience! üåü
Introducing To-Do list tab, the one-stop solution to make your new tabs more productive, personalized, and visually appealing. Here's what it offers:

Swift Search Bar: Jump start your browsing. No more waiting. Search as soon as you open a new tab using Yahoo.

To-Do List & Notes: Forget notepads or other tools. Jot down tasks, ideas, and reminders right in your browser. Every important note you make comes with a timestamp, so you know exactly when you penned down that brilliant idea.

Persistent Memory: We respect your tasks and notes. Everything gets saved securely in local storage. No more lost tasks after a refresh or restart.

Randomized Wallpapers: Refresh and relish. Every time you open a new tab, be greeted with a stunning, random wallpaper to inspire and delight.

Why Install?

    Boost productivity with an in-built to-do list.
    Enjoy a visually fresh experience with every tab.
    Keep notes and tasks intact even after refreshes.
    Simplify your tasks and notes, all in one place.

Say goodbye to the mundane new tabs and hello to a richer browsing experience with To-Do list tab.
